com.jdroid.android.adapter
Class BaseHolderArrayAdapter<ITEM,VIEWHOLDER>

java.lang.Object
  android.widget.BaseAdapter
      android.widget.ArrayAdapter<T>
          com.jdroid.android.adapter.BaseArrayAdapter<ITEM>
              com.jdroid.android.adapter.BaseHolderArrayAdapter<ITEM,VIEWHOLDER>
Type Parameters:
ITEM - An item in the list.
VIEWHOLDER - A view holder containing all the necessary Views for an item's layout.
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter
Direct Known Subclasses:
ContextualItemsAdapter, ShareAdapter
public abstract class BaseHolderArrayAdapter<ITEM,VIEWHOLDER>
extends BaseArrayAdapter<ITEM>

BaseArrayAdapter for lists that takes care of reusing the items' views.

Author:
Estefania Caravatti

createViewHolderFromConvertView

protected abstract VIEWHOLDER createViewHolderFromConvertView(android.view.View convertView)
Creates a VIEWHOLDER from the given convertView. Please declare the VIEWHOLDER class as static when possible

Parameters:
convertView - The convertView from the list.
Returns:
The new VIEWHOLDER.
